EXPERIMENTS

Journal Day 0

I have decided to start journaling from today onwards. Today is Sunday 7/11/2021. I did nothing special yesterday and I did nothing special today. I will also do nothing special tomorrow.
I did search up an interesting word today: megillah, which means a lengthy and tediously complicated situation or matter.

Interestingly this word seems to describe most of the problems in my life.

Here is a picture of a dog that is not mine

There are 3 different dogs. A different one comes out depending on what size your browser screen is.
